it.unitn.lifecoach.service.process.selfmonitoring

Class UserProcessResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unitn.lifecoach.service.process.selfmonitoring.UserProcessResource

  • public class UserProcessResource
extends Object
    This class is used to manage User related information such as creating new, updating existing information, getting existring information using a unique id or activation and deactivation of an account
    Author:
    Elvis Koci , Kemele Muhammed Endris

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        public User addUser(User user)
        Create a new user profile to the system
        Parameters:
        user - a User object to be stored/created. Its name, username and password properties should not be null.
        Returns:
        A newly created User data if successful, null - otherwise

      • getUser

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getUser(String username,
                                String token)
        Get User information stored in the system.
        Parameters:
        username - username of a user to retrieve
        token - authentication token generated for this user during login time
        Returns:
        Response 204 if username or/and token are null or if user with specified username doesnt exist
        Response 401 if user token is not valid
        Response 200 with User detail information

      • updateUser

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateUser(User user,
                                   String username,
                                   String token)
        Update User information; username, status and token cannot be updated using this method
        Parameters:
        user - updated user information
        username - id of a user to be updated
        token - authentication token generated while the user logs in
        Returns:
        Response 204 if user, username or/and token are null or if user with specified username doesnt exist
        Response 401 if user token is not valid
        Response 200 with User detail information

      • deactivateUser

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deactivateUser(String username,
                                       String token)
        Deactivates a user account
        Parameters:
        username - id of a user to deactivate
        token -
        Returns:
        Response 204 if username or/and token are null or if user with specified username doesnt exist
        Response 401 if user token is not valid
        Response 200 with User detail information if deactivate successful

      • activateUser

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response activateUser(String username,
                                     String token)
        Activates a user Account
        Parameters:
        username - id of a user to activate
        token -
        Returns:
        Response 204 if username or/and token are null or if user with specified username doesnt exist
        Response 401 if user token is not valid
        Response 200 with User detail information if activation successful
